name: Stone Throw
description:
Place stones during the day.

Throw them at Night.

Controls:

-Left and Right Arrow Keys : Move

-Space Bar : Jump, Throw/Double Jump

Supports Keyboard and Gamepad.

Alt + Enter for Full Screen

Tips:

Go for big points and Extra Life by chaining row completion combos during the day

Win By:

  • Completing 40 Rows
  • Surviving 15 Days & Nights
  • or just getting a score higher than your friends

Made By:

Dakota Cummins - Graphics & Concept John-Michael Veach - Music, SFX, Programing, Graphics, & Concept
